adminReleases.releaseNoteDescription: Users can now track the status of their complaints in real time with progress updates.

feedback.feedbackText: This makes it so much easier to stay updated. Great feature!
Very helpful, especially when dealing with delayed responses.

adminReleases.releaseNoteDescription: Our complaint management system is now available on Android and iOS platforms.

feedback.feedbackText: The app is smooth and user-friendly. Reporting issues is much faster now.

adminReleases.releaseNoteDescription: Implemented new encryption protocols to safeguard user data and privacy.

feedback.feedbackText: Good to know our information is now more secure.
